attributes.action: Make Theresa May deliver a ‘No Deal’ stance to the European Union before 29/3/19
attributes.background: The European Union have had control of the entire negotiation process since we agreed the £multi-billion divorce figure. The only deal(s) on the table are completely unacceptable and do not satisfy the referendum result. No Deal will force the EU to offer a mutually beneficial deal.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "deliver a no deal stance to the European Union".

You might like to sign this petition which calls on the UK to leave without a deal in March 2019 instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
